about_the_game:
Sketch Magician is a 2D action game where players fight using sketches as weapons.

In a world of sketchbooks where you get lost, you control a stick figure wizard and defeat enemies by firing freely drawn pictures as attacks.

Experience a sketch battle like never before, where your strategy and creativity will be tested!

◆ How sketch magic works

When you sketch and decide the direction of the shot, the picture you drew will become an attack!

Arrow-like attacks, shields to block enemy attacks, barriers to trap enemies... it's all up to your sketch.

Unlock new sketch techniques and expand your strategy!

◆ Game progress

As you clear stages, more powerful enemies appear.

Boss battles require unique sketch tactics!

As you progress through the game, new skills will be unlocked and you will be able to draw more magic.

◆ Game modes

Enjoy sketch battles in single player mode.

Play VS mode with your friends in multiplayer mode. (To be added in an update!)
